ModMetaData.name: SeedsPlease
ModMetaData.author: notfood
ModMetaData.description: Seeds for your immersion pleasure. Included support for mods: - CrustyPeanutsRimCuisine - CuprosDrinksSoda - EPSoybeans - JecrellsTobacco - TExpandedCrops - TwoskiSynthmeat - VGPGardenDrinks - VGPGardenFabrics - VGPGardenGourmet - VGPGardenMedicine - VGPGardenResources - VGPMoreVeggies - VGPVegetableGarden - VGPXtra - XeosGeneticallyEngineeredPlants
